 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקֵּל‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Zech.11.7|Zech 11:7]]</sup> (apparently **feminine** [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]], where <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּהֶן‎</span>, but Samaritan <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּהֶם‎</span>) ==rod, staff== (√ dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] assumes √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מקל‎</span> ***sprout***; [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW xi. 1891, 170f.</sup> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קלל‎</span> = ***shake***, with reference to oracle of the lot (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִלְקַל בַּחִצִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.21.36|Ezek 21:36]]); Barth<sup>ZMG xii.1887, 616</sup> gives √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קל‎</span>, and compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stick driven*** by another, in sport; [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>ZA iii. 52</sup>, compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***growth, stem, palm-tree*** (interchange of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>)); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> absolute [[Num.22.27|Num 22:27]] construct [[Jer.1.11|Jer 1:11]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקַּל‎</span> [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְלִי‎</span> [[Gen.32.11|Gen 32:11]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְלוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.17.40|1Sam 17:40]]; [[Hos.4.12|Hos 4:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקֶּלְכֶם‎</span> [[Exod.12.11|Exod 12:11]] plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְלוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] + 6 t.; — 

**1.** branch of tree as ***rod, stick***, used by Jacob in breeding his flocks, [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבְנֶה לַח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>), v[[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] v[[Gen.30.38|Gen 30:38]] v[[Gen.30.39|Gen 30:39]] v[[Gen.30.41|Gen 30:41]] v[[Gen.30.41|Gen 30:41]] of symbolic rod (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקֵד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> ***almond-rod***) in Jeremiah's vision [[Jer.1.11|Jer 1:11]] symbolic rods or staves, with names, used by prophets [[Zech.11.7|Zech 11:7]]; [[Zech.11.10|Zech 11:10]]; [[Zech.11.14|Zech 11:14]] figurative of Moab <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּבְּאָרָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Jer.48.17|Jer 48:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַטֵּהעֹֿז‎</span>). 

**2.** ***staff***, used in journeying [[Gen.32.11|Gen 32:11]]; [[Exod.12.11|Exod 12:11]]; [[1Sam.17.40|1Sam 17:40]] compare v[[1Sam.17.43|1Sam 17:43]] carried even when riding [[Num.22.27|Num 22:27]] so also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקֵּל יָד‎</span> [[Ezek.39.9|Ezek 39:9]] (= ***riding-stick***) according to [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Da|Da]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]]; &lt; a weapon ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָגֵּן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִנָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶשֶׁת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִצִּים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹמַח‎</span>. 

**3.** ***wand*** of diviner [[Hos.4.12|Hos 4:12]].
